title: Group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set
OB: When an error occurs, an error message is displayed.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set. Users should be able to define a group even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the 'Group' section.
3. Observe the behavior when no dataset is selected. The group dialog should still be accessible and usable.
